trans-unit.source: Represents a service that must be added to the workflow run-time engine for local services communications to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 表示一种服务，必须添加到本地服务通信，以启用工作流运行时引擎。

trans-unit.source: Local service implementations are required to be added to the ExternalDataExchangeService for these services to be properly initialized and registered.
trans-unit.target: 本地服务实现都需要添加到这些服务 ExternalDataExchangeService，若要正确地初始化和注册。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A local service implementation is a class that implements an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]本地服务实现是实现<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>标记的接口的类

trans-unit.source: Local services added in this way are used by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>和<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>使用以这种方式添加的本地服务

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A collection of parameters used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: 用于配置服务的参数集合。

trans-unit.source: The allowed values are an empty collection or a collection that contains only the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConfigurationSection" name="ConfigurationSection" href=""></xref> key.
trans-unit.target: 允许的值为空集合或集合只包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_ConfigurationSection" name="ConfigurationSection" href=""></xref>密钥。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration section that contains this service's desired configuration.
trans-unit.target: 包含此服务所需的配置的配置节名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The configuration section that contains settings for this service.
trans-unit.target: 包含此服务设置的配置节。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到指定的服务<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service to add.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要添加的服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: service is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: service为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The external run-time container was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到外部运行时容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service implementation of the specified interface type, if the service is available.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的接口类型的服务实现，如果服务可用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the interface implemented by the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的由要检索的服务实现的接口。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the requested service, or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 实现的请求的服务或为 null 的对象 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果无法解析服务。

trans-unit.source: service is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: service为空引用 ()。

trans-unit.source: The service is not registered with the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 未向运行时注册服务。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的服务从<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the service to remove.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要移除的服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: service is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: service为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The service is not registered with the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 未向运行时注册服务。

trans-unit.source: Adds local services if a configuration section was specified during construction of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果在对象的构造期间指定配置节，请添加本地服务。
